comment: Really like this distillery, the brbn and single malt are great, every time I’m in Kelowna bc I stop in for samples and they have free shipping Canada wide. Tho I didnt really enjoy the single malt rum barrel finish

Nose of vanilla, honey, caramel corn. Initial impressions are creamy in texture and predominantly of violet, honey, malt and hints of grassy flower stem. This opens into predominantly oak and honey. Simple but enjoyable.
